body_content.explanation: a period between two events or times:
examples: We see each other at regular intervals - usually about once a month.
The plants should be spaced at six-inch intervals.

body_content.explanation: a short period between the parts of a performance or a sports event:
examples: There will be two 20-minute intervals during the opera.
He scored his first goal of the match three minutes after the interval.

body_content.explanation: repeated after a particular period of time or a particular distance:
examples: In the event of fire, the alarm will sound at 15-second intervals/at intervals of 15 seconds.

body_content.explanation: the amount by which one note is higher or lower than another:
examples: an interval of a fifth (= between one note and another one four notes higher)
